comment: If by strong you mean it appears she has been attacked by a strong tiger who has shredded her jacket, then, YES! Very strong!
amr:
# ::snt If by strong you mean it appears she has been attacked by a strong tiger who has shredded her jacket, then, YES! Very strong!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / have-condition-91
            :ARG1 (y / yes
                  :mode expressive)
            :ARG2 (m2 / mean-01
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG2 (s / strong-02)))
      :snt2 (s2 / strong-02
            :degree (v / very))
      :snt3 (s3 / strong-02
            :degree v)
      :snt2 (s4 / strong-02
            :mode expressive))

comment: It's my birthday can I get a bday shout out please
amr:
# ::snt It's my birthday can I get a bday shout out please
(p / possible-01
      :ARG1 (g / get-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (s / shout-out-03
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (b / birthday
                        :poss ii)))
      :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (b2 / be-temporally-at-91
                  :ARG2 b)))
